metadata.description:
Everyone's favorite groovy super heroine is back in all new four-issue mini-series! After being reawakened in our era, Judo Girl finds herself more isolated than ever. And after a tragic battle with a former nemesis, Judo Girl decides to hang up her go-go boots forever! 

Judo Girl reluctantly dons her super-hero guise, but as she works undercover with the Revolution, she discovers their anarchist beliefs jive with her '60s sensibilities. Now, Judo Girl must decide which side she's really on.
metadata.name: Judo Girl: So You Want to Have a Revolution
